event.title: is built alongside old Nazareth, and had a Jewish population of 40,312 in 2014

data.event: Nazareth Illit (lit. "Upper Nazareth") is built alongside old Nazareth, and had a Jewish population of 40,312 in 2014.

event.title: was declared a separate city in June 1974

data.event: The Jewish sector was declared a separate city in June 1974.
